name: tasteroom
tag_list: wine, wine-tasting, wine-database, wine-lookup, cellar, virtual-cellar
overview: The tasteroom website is a place where you can search an ever growing wine database, choose a wine and add them to “My Tasteroom”. Our staff personally verifies user submitted wines. Once you have registered you will have access to the “My Tasteroom” area where you will be able to “Search Wines” use the “My Profile” section and access our member forums. Your “My Tasteroom” area will give you the ability to track specific labels or vineyards, organize them in graphical Virtual Wine Racks™ and keep a log of what you have come across in your own wine tasting adventures. You will also have the chance to critique them and if you wish, share your opinions with other users.
